import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faLocationCrosshairs } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faMagnifyingGlass } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getCurWeatherFunc } from './weatherReducer' import { fetchForecast } from './ForecastWReducer' import { getHourlyWeatherFunc } from './HourlyWReducer' export default function NavBlock() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [location, setLocation] = useState('Ukraine') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(getCurWeatherFunc(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) dispatch(fetchForecast(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) dispatch(getHourlyWeatherFunc(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getCurWeatherFunc(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) dispatch(fetchForecast(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) dispatch(getHourlyWeatherFunc(location)).catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
weatherio
setLocation(e.target.value)} type="text" placeholder='Type Any Location...'/>
) }
